column4: Hey guys, unning off a live CD. Ubuntu foobared on me. I installed some firmware for a tv capture card. When I rebooted it took a while to come back up. Then I was met with just a blink cursor. I tried again and nothing happened. I then selected ubuntu recover mode. THat took a while, and then froze at something about Face font... I don't remember. Anyway. I got to the login... sigh of relief, then tried to type in my
Can I just install over the OS and will ubuntu leave my files  ?
Cause you know ... I can't start my computer anymore
you can personally backup ur files from within windows using ntfs file utility that will locate your linux partition, so that u can backup them
